snippet: It's safe to say that few companies have experienced as rapid a rise as Instagram, whose valuation has increased by 50 fold in little more than a year.
abstract: It's safe to say that few companies have experienced as rapid a rise as Instagram, whose valuation has increased by 50 fold in little more than a year.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: The Short, Explosive Rise in Instagram's Valuation
